title: When twitch hears the wrong thing
body:
Mccree - "it's high noon"

Twitch - "he said the N word"

Ban.

replies.body: When Twitch sees the wrong thing: "my eyes are on the side of my head! :("
Deadbeat discussion. The only people defending tfblade support tfblade on stream.

https://livestreamfails.com/post/48044

You can judge for yourself

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l1xKAJZA,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-04-26T01:52:51.936+0000)
>
> https://livestreamfails.com/post/48044
> 
> You can judge for yourself

Where in that was he supposed to have said the n word?

Who knows.

Twitch staff heard it. But many heard idiot instead.
Fucking thought police. He didn't even say the N word there.

> [{quoted}](name=Kalikain,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l1xKAJZA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-25T15:24:44.760+0000)
>
> Deadbeat discussion. The only people defending tfblade support tfblade on stream.

I didn't know who tfblade was till now. Hmm

it sounded like nigati on regular speed to me
not a long stretch to think that he said negative
although i wonder what is the meaning behind "fucking negative" without context

it's not really about defending but policing language to such an extent to give a 30 day ban in an instant is kinda ridiculous
